verbose_text: The structure of the cold-stable bundle of MTs that associates with each kinetochore in a mammalian cells was elucidated in this way [XREF_BIBR], and the structure of both kinetochore associated MTs [XREF_BIBR] and other spindle MTs that contribute to mammalian spindle structure [XREF_BIBR] were similarly studied (XREF_FIG A-D).
evidence: MTs that associates with each kinetochore
